name: Trillium Wildflower Botanical Ring
description:
Three petal trillium flower ring with leaves is sculptural and expressive yet captures the spare beauty of this wildflower. The detail and style is reminiscent of an old world botanical engraving or woodcut. Each ring is hand finished and sized to order. 

Shown in size 6 1/2. Width of flower is 5/8".

Trilliums are one of North Americas most beautiful wildflowers. In the language of flowers Trilliums mean 'modest beauty' or 'purity'. This Trillium ring is newest of my flower rings.

I carved the original in wax, constantly turning and observing every angle. The ring is cast in sterling silver then given a light oxidation (tarnish) to enhance the detail of texture in the petals and leaves. The edges are polished. The look is refined and classic. This ring has wonderful weight and will last for generations. 

Order your sized from the menu. If you need a 1/4 (you are between two sizes) please note this at checkout. Each ring is hand finished to order. Please allow 2-3 days before shipping.

Gift packaged. No charge shipping-USPS Priority shipping to US. FedEx option is available.
International - please inquire. 

Trillium ring can be custom ordered in 18k white or yellow gold.

name: Chrysoprase Oval Cabochon Minimal Earrings 18k
description:
Soft translucent natural Chrysoprase set in minimal style earrings.  Expressive and individualistic. Soft brush hand finish in 18k gold.

I never tire of green stones! Beautifully well proportioned apple green oval high cabochons are nearly gem color. Nicely polished front and back. Chrysoprase is natural apple green color agate. Measures 10 mm x 12 mm. Drop length (from ear wire) is 1 1/16".

The stones are set in my own setting. Hand shaped ear wires are curved to balance the flexible setting on the ear. 

Signed FAVRE on reverse. Stamped 18k on wires.

Ships to Continental US -Only. FedEx 2-day. Signature and phone number is required for delivery. **Alaska and Hawaii please inquire- additional shipping charges may apply.

name: Acorn Pendant 18k
description:
Cast from 18k yellow gold and expertly hand finished to preserve the intricate natural texture of the original acorn. A small ring and large oval jump ring are attached. 

Acorns have inspired artists for centuries. Different Oak species produce acorns of different shapes. This acorn was selected from hundreds that I have gathered from a pin oak tree on my property. The size, form and proportion is perfect and nearly symmetrical. I made a mold and cast this in two pieces in 18k yellow gold. It is carefully (nearly invisibly) re-assembled without disturbing the natural texture. Since it is hollow it is not super heavy but it has substantial weight not found in commercially produced jewelry.

This listing is for the pendant only. It is shown with an oxidized silver chain that is NOT INCLUDED. The oval ring is not soldered closed. The ring as is will accept a chain up to 3 mm. 
Drop length is 5/8" x 1/2 " wide. Ring is stamped 18k FAVRE .

Ships via FedEx insured 2-day to Continental US. Alaska and Hawaii please inquire. A signature is required for delivery. I will only ship to the PayPal address. Gift Packaged. $25 will be added during check out.

Please contact me to discuss and purchase custom options:
Solder link closed- or to order a larger link.
Gold chain
Silver Chain
Enhancer link (large oval link that opens and closes over most chains or pearls)

name: Shell Clip Earring Cross Barred Venus
description:
Perfect summer earrings! Cross barred venus shell cast in 18k yellow gold with clip back. Artistic hand finishing accentuates the natural linear texture. Approximately 5/8" W x 1/2" H.

The shell (pictured with ruler) is from my extensive collection of shells. This shell was found on Cape Hatteras in North Carolina. 

18k clip with or without post is positioned slightly above center. 
Hand round ring is added for optimum comfort.

Please choose clip with post or clip only. Please allow 2-3 weeks for delivery. The earrings are made to order. 

Ships to US Continental (Hawaii and Alaska please inquire for additional shipping charge.) Please include phone number. Signature is required for delivery.

STORE POLICIES: http://mimifavre.bigcartel.com/store-policies

name: Dogwood Flower 18k Earrings
description:
American native Dogwood flower in full bloom is delicately sculpted with rich botanical detail on front and back. Cast in 18k rose gold and individually hand finished. Made to order. Please allow 2-3 weeks.

I am an avid gardner and sometime botanical painter. Like artists of all ages I too am inspired by beautiful flowers. I carved the original in wax. Each petal is different. 

Flower is 3/8" in diameter. 14k rose gold posts. Signed Favre

Gift packaged. FedEX 2-day shipping to continental US. (Alaska and Hawaii additional shipping- please inquire before purchasing.)

Please provide a phone number for FedEx shipping document. A signature is required for delivery.

Also available in 18k Yellow Gold. Please contact me.
STORE POLICIES: http://mimifavre.bigcartel.com/store-policies

name: Dogwood Flowers 18k Rose Gold Ring
description:
Two Dogwood flowers with leaves are sculpted as a natural botanical style ring. Hand finishing accentuates the botanical details.

The original Dogwood ring was commissioned by a prominent gardening couple. I was asked to create a ring with American native dogwood flowers, her favorite, that would symbolize their commitment to each other. The design is timeless and has become a best seller.

The ring is cast in 18k rose gold. Signed Favre and stamped 18k. Available in sizes 5-8. 

MADE TO ORDER:  Delivery is 2-3 weeks. 
Include your ring size when you purchase as a note or contact me. I will confirm your size request when I receive your order. If you are unsure I will send plastic ring sizers to you. 

Shipping is via FedEx Insured 2-day US ONLY. Signature is required for delivery. Please provide a phone number for the FedEx shipping document. Ships to US only. (Alaska and Hawaii may incur additional shipping cost- please inquire.)

STORE POLICIES: http://mimifavre.bigcartel.com/store-policies

name: Sapphire Antique Disc Ring 18k
description:
From my Antique collection. Circular and domed 18k yellow gold with a raised pattern over domed base. Full round solid wire shank is polished as is the underside of the dome. Refined stylized elements evoke a period piece of antique jewelry. Center stone is blue Sapphire. Great on a smaller hand as right hand ring or as a pinky ring. Size 6.

1/2" wide (Circle). 1.75mm wide shank. Stamped FAVRE.

FedEx 2-day shipping US ONLY. Signature Required. Please state ring size.

Similar Earrings: http://mimifavre.bigcartel.com/product/diamond-antique-disc-earrings-18k

name: Diamond Antique Disc Earrings 18k
description:
Round domes of 18 karat gold have a center bezel set diamond surrounded by a pattern of curled raised wires. From a series of pieces called 'Antique'. The earrings were inspired by an antique button that had a beautiful etched design. 

Wear these earrings everyday with t-shirt and jeans or your little black dress. Classic timeless design. Heirloom quality. 18k posts.
Dimensions â€“ 1/2 inch diameter. Diamonds .13 ct. Gift Packaged. Made entirely in the USA.

Shipping Via Fed-Ex 2-day to continental US only. Signature and phone number are required for delivery.

Please contact me with your comments or questions. Also available with emeralds, ruby or sapphire.

name: Moon Man With Diamond Eye Pendant
description:
Man in the moon with a diamond eye. Waxing moon silouette. Universal cosmic symbol of the wonder of the universe. Timeless depiction of the 'Man in the Moon'.

I carved the original in wax then after casting it in silver I refined the details. The eye is set with a white E-F Si diamond (eye clean). Stamped FAVRE - Sterling. The weight is substanial. The reverse is hollowed a bit in contour. Beautiful and carefull hand finishing makes this a fine piece of jewelry. The smooth surface is oxidized to dark gray.

The moon man is 1 1/8" long. The imported Italian chain is 20" faceted silver, also oxidized.

No Charge USPS Priority Shipping-US only. Gift Packaged in Suede Hinge box within gift box.
Expedited shipping via FedEx is available for additional charges. Phone number and signature required for this service. Contact me.

name: Seahorse Earrings 18k Clip
description:
Sea God, Sea Dragon or symbol of Good Luck, seahorses have inspired many tales of lore and it is no exception to the couple who inspired them.

The drop is 1 1/4". They are cast in 18K gold with clip back. A post can be added. Signed FAVRE inside. This is exclusively my work.

Made to order- Allow 3 weeks. (2nd image of silver Seahorse illustrates size)

Gift Packaged.  FedEx 2-Day Shipping US only--A signature is required for delivery. $35 will be added during checkout.

name: Ginkgo Leaf Brooch 18K
description:
Delicate long stem Gingko leaf brooch. Hand finishing subtle edge of stem and ridges. Cast in 18k re-cycled yellow gold. 2" 18k pin stem with catch. Signed. Dimensions are 2 1/2" long x 1 1/4 wide (leaf).

This item is made to order. Allow 3-4 weeks. Price is subject to change due to the fluctuating gold market.

Shipping to Continental US via FedEx 2-day Insured. Signature and phone number required for delivery. $35 will be added at checkout.

Please contact me with any questions.

name: Chrysoprase Minimal Pendant 18k
description:
Soft translucent natural Chrysoprase set in minimal style 18k pendant. Perfect pop of color to layer or wear alone. Expressive and individualistic.

Beautifully well proportioned apple green oval high cabochon is nearly gem color. Nicely polished front and back. Chrysoprase is natural apple green color agate. This is a very pretty stone. Tiny black spot on reverse is natural. Measures 11 mm x 14 mm.

This stone is in a setting that I designed and made. 

The chain is shown with 18k round cable (#1) and faceted cable (#2)--both from Italy. 20" Signed FAVRE. (Please specify your choice.)

Ships to Continental US. FedEx 2-day. Signature and phone number is required for delivery. **Alaska and Hawaii please inquire- additional shipping charges may apply.

name: Classic Hammered Gold Hoops 18k
description:
Classic solid 18k gold hand fabricated hoop earrings. Each pair is made to order from re-cycled 18k gold. The earrings are given a  subtle hand hammer texture. 

This pair is 1 1/8" in diameter. Highest quality posts and friction backs are used. The wire is 1.6mm thick. The earrings strike a careful balance on the ear. Signed FAVRE 18k.

The look is classic. Each pair is made to order. Please allow up to 2 weeks to ship.

Shipping is by 2 Day FedEx delivery- US Only. Signature and phone # is required. Gift packaged.

Please feel free to contact me with questions.

name: Ginkgo Leaf Earrings 18k Gold
description:
Distinctive in their fernlike appearance, ginkgo biloba leaf earrings are cast in 18k gold. The ancient Ginkgo tree is one of the oldest living tree species.

Artists have been inspired by the beautiful unusual form and texture of Ginkgo leaves for centuries.  This pair of earrings is cast in 18k gold from my original design. The wire is soldered to each earring, hand shaped and finished on front and back entirely by hand. 

The earrings strike a perfect balance of being substantial visually yet very light and comfortable to wear. (Image #4 is Silver Ginkgo on Model).

The drop length is just over 1". The leaf is 1/2" wide. MF and 18k stamp. Earrings are packaged in a hard hinged box within a gift box.

Shipping is via FED EX- insured 2 Day Continental US. Signature required. $25.00 will be added at check-out. ***4/12/13--Please allow 2-3 weeks.

name: Acorn Earrings 18K Gold
description:
Real acorns from a pin oak tree, cast in 18k gold, are elegant yet understated earrings that could one could wear with any outfit. Subtle textures of the acorn and cap create a unique surface that only mother nature could provide. This is a stunning pair of earrings that will never go out of fashion.

The earrings are cast in 18k gold. They are hollow so they are not weighty. This is an extremely comfortable pair of earrings that could be worn day after day. 

Drop length 7/8". Width of acorn 7/16. Height of acorn 1/2".

Presently delivery on this pair is 2-3 weeks.

Shipping via FedEx 2-day insured Continental US. Signature is required.

name: Seahorse Sterling Silver Pendant
description:
Sea God, Sea Dragon or symbol of Good Luck, seahorses have inspired many tales of lore and it is no exception to the couple who commissioned this special creature.

Both were young Americans living abroad in Italy when they met and fell in love. While on a romantic day of boating on The Bay of Naples they traded a fisherman one of their cigarettes for a live Seahorse. They have been married more than fifty years and the precious Seahorse has been kept safely in cotton box. I borrowed the actual seahorse to reference as I carved this slightly stylized version.

I carved this seahorse in wax, cast it then made a mold. This seahorse is cast from re-cycled sterling silver.
I soldered a ring on top so that it can be worn as a pendant. The chain is 20" faceted Italian made.

I think this would also look great on a leather necklace.

The drop is 1 1/4". The piece has been cast with my name FAVRE inside. This is exclusively my work and only available in this shop.

No Charge Shipping-USPS Priority. US only.

name: Botanical Dogwood Flowers 18k Gold Ring
description:
Two Dogwood flowers with leaves are sculpted into an 18k gold ring. The ring is very detailed and hand finished in a way that accentuates the botanical details. 

The original Dogwood ring was commissioned by a prominent gardening couple. I was asked to create a ring with American native dogwood flowers, her favorite,  that would symbolize their commitment to each other. The design is timeless and has become a best seller.

The ring is cast in 18k gold. Hallmark and stamped 18k. Available in sizes 5-8. delivery is 2-3 weeks. Include your ring size when you purchase as a note or contact me. I will confirm your size request when I receive your order. If you are unsure I will send plastic ring sizers to you.

Shipping is via FedEx Insured 2-day US ONLY. Signature is required for delivery. Ships to US only. Alaska and Hawaii may incur additional shipping cost.

name: Ginkgo Leaf Earrings Sterling Silver
description:
Distinctive in their fernlike appearance, ginkgo biloba leaf earrings are cast in sterling silver. The ancient Ginkgo tree is one of the oldest living tree species.

Artists have been inspired by the beautiful unusual form and texture of Ginkgo leaves for centuries. I made the first earring in metal and then used it to make a mold. This pair of earrings is cast in sterling silver. The wire is soldered to each earring, hand shaped and finished on front and back entirely by hand. There are no purchased elements on this earring-they are exclusive to Favre Bijoux Etsy shop.

The earrings strike a perfect balance of being substantial visually yet very light and comfortable to wear. 

The drop length is just over 1". The leaf is 1/2" wide. MF and Sterling stamp. Earrings are gift  packaged. 

**3/30- 2 week turnaround- I'm waiting for new castings. Will ship after 4/15/11.
There is NO CHARGE for shipping via USPS priority continental US.

name: Antique Square 18k Earrings
description:
Slightly domed square of 18 karat gold has a center bead surrounded by a pattern of curled raised wires. The edge is finished with a round wire edge. From a series of pieces called 'Antique'. 

The earrings were inspired by an antique button that had a beautiful etched design. Wear these earrings everyday with t-shirt and jeans or your little black dress. Classic timeless design. Heirloom quality. 18k posts. Gift Packaged.

Cast in 18k yellow gold, 18k posts and backs. Signed FAVRE 18k. 3/4" square. Entirely made in USA.

Ships via FedEx 2-day. US Only. Signature and phone required for delivery. Ships in 2 business days days.
 
Feel free to contact me with your questions.

name: Antique Swirl Ring 18k
description:
Solid gold 18k ring from my Antique Collection. Classic solid gold ring has relief pattern that has been high polished to contrast with the texture of cast gold. Refined in all of the right ways one expects from finely crafted jewelry. Polished on the inside throughout and around the ring shank. The domed section is left with a brushed/hammered finish. Size 5-8. Allow 3 weeks.

5/16" wide. Classic styling allows for this to be worn with other rings or as your favorite right hand ring. Stamped FAVRE 18K

Fed Ex 2-day shipping to US only. Signature is required. Please state your ring size. Gift Packaged in ring box with hinge.

Feel free to contact me with questions.

name: Tourmaline Antique Bead Dangle Earrings 18k
description:
I have an affinity for tourmalines because they are available in a wide range of colors. This pair features rose-pink cabochon cut stones 4mm x 6mm. 

My intention with this design is to create a modern earring yet reference the look of antiquity. The crescent top makes a most comfortable wear and the long narrow bead is indeed hollow. 

All of the components, the setting, the small crescent top and the full bead are my own design and manufacture. The setting is 6 prongs. The elements are cast in 18k yellow gold then hand finishing and skillfully assembled. All rings are soldered closed. The raised swirls are polished and the surrounding surface is left in a semi-raw texture.

Drop length is 1 1/2". Made entirely in USA.

Ships via 2 day Fed-Ex to continental US only. Signature and phone number are required.

Please contact me if you would like a different stone color or to discuss other custom options.

Store Policiy: http://mimifavre.bigcartel.com/store-policies

name: South Sea Pearl Morning Glory 18k
description:
Stylized Morning Glory botanical pod holds natural color 11.5 mm pale yellow South Sea pearls.  18k gold hand shaped earwires.

Elegant and comfortable to wear all day. Timeless classic design. 

Ships via 2-day FedEx. US ONLY.  A signature is required. 

Please contact me if you have any questions.

name: South Sea Pearl Pyramid 18k Gold Earrings
description:
Natural fine white South Sea pearls are capped with 18k gold Pyramid top. Handforged earwires. One of a kind.

Pearls are 12mm.

Signed FAVRE. Gift Packaged.

FedEx 2-day shipping to US. Signature required.

name: Yellow South Sea Pearl Earrings Pyramid 18k Rose Gold
description:
Natural colored yellow South Sea pearls with 18k rose gold pyramid cap. Hand forged earwires. Signed FAVRE 18k and One of a Kind.

Pearls are 12mm. Natural untreated color.

Gift Packaged.

2 Day FedEx to continental US. Signature is required.

name: Sleeping Beauty Flat Nugget Necklace 18 Toggle
description:
Graduated Sleeping Beauty turquoise nuggets are hand strung with knots and finished with an 18K toggle clasp. The clasp is signed FAVRE 18k - designed and made in my studio.

Sleeping Beauty turquoise is known for it's outstanding color. The nuggets are somewhat flat and have been polished and stabilized. The color is entirely natural. This is a unique strand of beads and makes a bold color statement. One of a kind. 

Nuggets measure: Center 1 1/4"x 7/8", back 3/4"x 1/2". Total length is 19".

Ships via FedEx- 2 day. US Only. A phone number and signature is required for delivery. Ships within 2 days.

Read my store policies here: http://mimifavre.bigcartel.com/store-policies

name: Sleeping Beauty Turquoise Earrings 18k Morning Glory Pod 10MM
description:
Morning Glory flower pods cap 10mm round half-drilled Turquoise from the Sleeping Beauty Mine in Arizona. The material is known for strong opaque intense turquoise color and in recent years has exhausted the richest color of stone in the mine. Going forward this color may be  hard to find. **Picture #3 shows 11mm, 10mm --this listing is for the 10mm pair.

Hand formed 18k earwires. I have sold these earrings for years--they do not ever go out of style! Classic styling for daywear or evening. Stamped FAVRE 18k. Drop approx. 3/4"

Fed Ex 2-day shipping to US Only. Signature required. Ships in 2 business days. Gift Packaged. Feel free to contact me with your questions and I will respond promptly.

Please read my store policy: http://mimifavre.bigcartel.com/store-policies

name: Turquoise Geometric Drop Earrings
description:
Long and beautifully polished turquoise drops are from the Sleeping Beauty mine in Arizona. The drops are capped with an elongated Pyramid of 18k gold. Hand shaped earwires.

Drop length is 1 3/4". Gift Packaged.

FedEx Shipping 2-day. Signature is required for delivery.

name: Sleeping Beauty Turquoise Earrings 18k Morning Glory Pod 11MM
description:
Morning Glory flower pods cap 11mm round half-drilled Turquoise from the Sleeping Beauty Mine in Arizona. The material is known for strong opaque intense turquoise color. **Picture#4- shows 11mm, 10mm --listing is for the 11mm pair only.

 Hand formed 18k earwires. I have sold these earrings for years--they do not ever go out of style! Classic styling for daywear or evening. Stamped FAVRE 18k.

Fed Ex 2-day shipping. Signature required. Ships in 2 business days. Gift Packaged. Feel free to contact me with your questions and I will respond promptly.

Please read my store policy: http://mimifavre.bigcartel.com/store-policies

name: Blue Tourmaline Ring 18k Gold
description:
The color of the ocean...Aqua-Blue tourmaline cabochon is bezel set in an 18k yellow gold ring. Elegant narrow band has a slightly concave shape which is the same width and thickness all around. The hollow of the band is left matte finish. All edges and the bezel are polished to reveal the flat surfaces. The open bezel allows light to pass through the stone thus enhancing its appeal. The oval bezel is positioned across the finger and sits above the band to allow several of these rings to stack side by side.

I designed and made the oringinal model for this ring. The bezel is soldered to the gold band. Tourmaline stones are found in every color of the spectrum. I hand select stones that are clean and clear that have exeptional color. Blue shades of tourmaline are the most coveted tourmaline color. The design and craftsmanship make this heirloom quality. Signed FAVRE and 18k.

Band is 2.5 mm width. Stone is approx 4mm x 6mm +/-. All 18k yellow gold.

Size 7 1/4. Can be resized before shipping (5 1/2 to 7 1/2). 

2 Day FedEx- Signature required.

name: Prehnite Minimalist Pendant
description:
Soft translucent natural Prehnite pendant. Subtle celery green color to layer or wear alone. Expressive and individualistic. Understated and minimal. 

This prenhite is part of a group of stones that I selected at the Tucson Gem show in February. Beautifully well proportioned oval high cabochon is nicely polished front and back revealing narrow striated bands of subtle color variation within. This is a very pretty stone. Measures 9.5 mm x 12.5 mm. I have to admit I am partial to green stones!

This stone is in a setting that I designed and made. I have a mold of this setting and use it for earrings and pendants. The jump ring is soldered closed. The stones make each piece one of a kind. 

The chain is faceted link from Italy. I love the visual contrast of the flat facet against the strong oval shape. Sterling silver - oxidized black. 20" Signed FAVRE.

Please contact me with any questions. Gift Packaged. No charge shipping in US via USPS Priority mail. FedEx upgrade is available--signature required.

name: Coral Drop Earrings
description:
Dark oxidized silver geometric elements hold Coral drops suggests a modern Art Deco style. The cap is an elongated pyramid with a slight curve between the points. The earring cap edges face forward. It is my design and made by me for this shop exclusively. 

A tiny ring is on the top point where the four distinctive sides meet. This allows for movement. The coral are held in by a riveted wire. The sillouette of this earring long and narrow. The personality is modern with a slight vintage look. 

Coral is non precious- dyed bamboo coral. The coral shade has a pinkish tone with some mottled lighter color. Oxidized sterling silver lever back. (Picture #4 is similar earring with faceted aquamarine- shown for scale.)

Versatile earrings for casual or dress. 

Drop length is approximate 1 5/8". Signed FAVRE, 925. Ships within 2 business days.

Gift Packaged. No Charge Shipping USPS Priority to continental US. Other locations please inquire.

name: Aquamarine Geometric Briolette Earrings
description:
Dark oxidized silver geometric elements hold pale Aquamarine briolets. The cap is an elongated pyramid with a slight curve between the points. The earring cap edges face forward. It is my design and made by me for this shop exclusively. 

A tiny ring is on the top point where the four distinctive sides meet. This allows for movement which accentuates light reflection of the facets of the transparent faceted briolet. The sillouette of this earring long and narrow. The personality is elegant and a little edgy.

Real aquamarine stones- not glass. Aquamarine is Beryl- some tiny pin point inclusions are visible but overall the cut and subtle pastel shade is very pretty. Oxidized sterling silver lever back. 

Perfect 'Something Blue' for a bride. Also a great versatile earring for casual or dress. 

Drop length is approximate 1 5/8". Signed FAVRE, 925. Ships within 2 business days.

No Charge Shipping USPS Priority to continental US. Other locations please inquire. I only ship with insurance.

name: Gingko Leaf Botanical Pendant Sterling Silver
description:
Handcarved large ginkgo leaf pendant is made from cast sterling silver. Meticulous hand finishing reveals the linear relief characteristic of this beautiful and ancient species. 

I was asked by a local non-profit to make a pendant that would match my Gingko earrings which I had planned to donate to their 'Art of Caring' fundraising auction event to benefit The Hickman in West Chester, PA. I will donate a portion of the sale of this pendant on an ongoing basis.

The pendant is signed FAVRE Sterling and includes a 20" oxidized Sterling Silver Italian Chain. This pendant is also available with an 18" chain. The chain can be purchased with or without oxidized finish.

The leaf measure approx. 1 1/4" x 1 1/4". 

No Charge Shipping US Priority Registered Insured. US ONLY.

name: Hydrangea Flower Pendant Sterling Silver
description:
From my Hydrangea Jewelry collection. Hydrangea quercifolia, commonly known as Oak Leaf hydrangea petal cast in sterling silver on a sterling silver chain. It is Inspired by the beautiful native plant found in the Eastern US and in my garden!

This pendant is in limited production from my original wax carving. The chain passes behind the petal which gives a very pretty silhouette. Detail and hand finishing on the hydrangea petal make this classic design a future heirloom. 

The oxidized chain, which is visually light and very flexible, is imported from Italy. I chose this style chain (sometimes known as berri) because it's finish compliments the veining on the petals which will darken over time. Signed MF and 925 stamp. 

The chain is 18" long. Petal is 7/8" diameter. Gift packaged. 

No Charge Shipping USPS to United States. Other Locations please inquire.

name: Heirloom Rose Botanical Sterling Silver Ring
description:
A single antique rose in bloom with two small buds and detailed leaves are sculpted into a botanical ring. I was inspired to create a likeness of a beautiful heirloom species rose that grows in my garden. 

This ring is like a small sculpture. It is completely hand finished.

Available in sizes 5-8. Please note your ring size in notes section of checkout. Each ring is custom sized. Stamped FAVRE and 925. Gift Packaged.

Please contact me if you are unsure of your ring size. 

No Charge shipping via USPS Priority in Continental US. Alaska and Hawaii please inquire. NOTE**Ships in 2 weeks.

name: Handfinished Dogwood Flower Ring Sterling Silver
description:
Two Dogwood flowers with leaves are sculpted as a silver ring. The ring is very detailed and has been oxidized and hand finished in a way that accentuates the botanical details. 

 A prominent garden writer came to me with a request: to create a ring with American native dogwood flowers to be worn everyday. This is the same ring which is cast from my original. I am an amateur botanical painter so sculpting this ring with botanical details was fun to do.

The ring is cast in sterling silver. Signed FAVRE and stamped 925. 

Available in size 4 up to size 8, please contact me or add a note with your ring size when you purchase. Gift packaged.

No Charge Shipping via USPS Priority to US. Ships in 2 business days.

name: Oakleaf Hydrangea Petal Earrings Silver and 18k gold
description:
Hydrangea Jewelry Collection. Oak leaf hydrangea petal earrings by FavreBijoux are cast in sterling silver. Center accent is 18k gold. The original petal was handcarved in wax then cast in silver. It is Inspired by the beautiful native shrub which grows in the Eastern US and in my garden!

The hand finishing is evident on the earrings. The center gold ball is added last and soldered in place.This pair of earrings is in limited production. Earrings have sterling posts and backs. 
Hallmark stamp MF and sterling. 


No Charge Shipping USPS Priority Insured continental US. Ships in 2 business days.

name: Bold Snail Shell Ring 18k
description:
This is a bold 18k gold shell ring that began as a worn snail shell found on the National Seashore in Cape Hatteras, North Carolina. I consider this to be the perfect statement ring for summer or year round. The weight is substantial yet comfortable to wear all day-everyday.

I have collected so many shells and pieces of shells over the years, that I have actually considered taking them back to the beach. Cape Hatteras National Seashore is a wild and beautiful place. It's unusual to find whole shells. 

Using the shell fragment for the top I sculpted the ring from a block of wax. It is cast in re-cycled 18k yellow gold. The entire ring is hand finished with a satin/brushed finish on the outside. Inside the ring is high polish. 

Due to rising gold prices this is SPECIAL ORDER ONLY--Ships within 3 weeks. Please note your ring size. Shown in size 7. Order up to size 8.

The ring is cast from a mold of my original design. Please state your ring size when ordering. Pricing is for size 6 to 8. It is shown with a brushed finish. It will gain character with wear like the shells from the beach it came from. 

The dimensions (top profile) are 5/8" x 3/4". Stamped 925 with hallmark. Packaged in a hinged ring box within box.

name: 18k Gold Hatteras Snail Shell Pendant Necklace
description:
Snail shell cast in 18 karat gold as a pendant on an oxidized sterling silver imported Italian snake chain. Collecting seashells is irrisistable when you walk the wild beaches of Cape Hatteras, North Carolina. The gold shell retains all the the characteristics and detail of a shell which has been gently polished by the ocean. Elegant and understated jewelry for the beach lover.

The shell pendant is in limited production and is cast in 18k gold.The detail of the nautilus is present underneath. The gold weight is substantial. A hidden bail underneath allows the shell to slide easily on the imported sterling silver snake chain. The chain is 1.3 mm wide and is 20" long. 
FedEx 2 day shipping- signature required. US ONLY.

name: Snail Shell Ring 18k
description:
This is a distinctive handmade 18k gold ring that began as a worn snail shell found on the beach in Cape Hatteras, North Carolina. It is a perfect ring for year round wear or as your favorite summer jewelry. 

I have collected so many shells and pieces of shells over the years, that I have actually considered taking them back to the beach. Cape Hatteras National Seashore is a wild and beautiful place. It's unusual to find whole shells. Using the shell fragment for the top I sculpted the ring from a block of wax. It is similar but smaller than the large shell ring also in the shop.

The ring is cast from my mold in 18k gold. It wil be made in your size- pricing is for size 4 up to 7. It is shown with a hand finished brushed finish. The inside is high polish. The finish will gain character with wear like the shells from the beach it came from.

The dimensions (top profile) are 1/2" x 1/2". Stamped FAVRE 18k. Gift Packaged.

Please state your ring size when ordering or contact me. **Due to the rising gold price I can only offer this as a paid custom order. 

Ships via FedEx 2-day within 3 weeks. US Only. Signature and phone number are required. 

This ring is also available in silver.

Please feel free to contact me here http://mimifavre.bigcartel.com/contact

name: Silver Hatteras Snail Shell Ring
description:
This is a bold silver shell ring that began as a worn snail shell found on the beach in Cape Hatteras, North Carolina. I consider this to be the perfect statement ring for summer or anyone who is lucky enough to live near the beach! 

I have collected so many shells and pieces of shells over the years, that I have actually considered taking them back to the beach. Cape Hatteras National Seashore is a wild and beautiful place. It's unusual to find whole shells. Using the shell fragment for the top I sculpted the ring from a block of wax.

The ring is cast from my mold in Sterling Silver. Available in size 4 to 7--Contact me or note your size on PayPal. It is shown with a brushed finish. It will gain character with wear like the shells from the beach it came from. 

The dimensions (top profile) are 5/8" x 3/4". Stamped 925 with hallmark. 
**THIRD PHOTO- shows a smaller shell ring in silver. This listing is for one large silver ring.


No charge shipping USPS Priority insured continental US.

name: Cross Barred Venus 18k Gold Seashell Earrings
description:
Petite cross barred venus shell earrings are cast in 18k yellow gold. The original shell was found on the Cape Hatteras National Seashore in North Carolina. Wear them non-stop all year!

The earrings are 18k yellow gold with 18k posts and friction backs. I have carefully finished the gold so that they retain the deeply ridged concentric circles by lightly polishing the raised circles. Reverse is completely polished. Marked MF 18k. Ships within 2 days.

I have collected shells washed onto the wild beach of the Outer Banks for years. They are never perfect- and that's ok with me. Shells that make it onto the beach on Hatteras Island are always a little smoother than shells from quieter waters.

Shipping is by FED EX Insured Continental US. Signature required.
